featured.text: But eye contact which persists longer than that can make us nervous.
Recalling the group’s first tour in Europe, Camake Valaule, a physical education teacher and the founder of the Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers, admitted that he felt very nervous.
When people feel uncomfortable or nervous, they may _____
There is currently no reason to believe that plants experience pain, because they are devoid of central nervous systems and brains.
It’s a long _____, and it makes students nervous.

definition.en_def: Feeling or showing anxiety or worry.
definition.example: She felt nervous before her big presentation.
